text: [Music]
hello I'm claudo A Cloud support
engineer N2 Windows SM here at AWS
office in Sydney today I'm going to show
you how to resolve Windows activation
issues on Amazon ec2 Windows instance
let's get
started Windows instances use Microsoft
Key Management Service or KMS for
Windows activation if your instance
can't reach the Microsoft KMS server
then you might receive a Windows
activation error message one issue could
be an incorrectly configured operating
system level route for example if you
deploy a new instance in a different
subnet from a custom Amazon machine
image or Ami and you didn't use ec2
lunch or ec2 config before you create
the Ami then you might experience
Windows activation issues because
Windows routes are an OS level
configuration the new instance keep the
same route configuration of the original
custom Ami if the subnet is different
then the routes might point to a
potentially unreachable
Gateway the Microsoft server in AWS are
251 to check the current OS rout rout
configuration run the following CMD or
Windows Powershell
command if the routes for the server are
using the correct gateway then
activation May
Fail for Windows 2016 and 2019 instances
with ec2 launch V1 installed to resit
the cor at OS level routing table run
this Windows Powershell commands
for Windows 2022 or Windows 2016 and
2019 instances with ec2 lunch V2
installed ec2 lunch automatically raises
the OS level routes every time window
start if you need to manually res the
routes without restarting the instance
then run these commands to start ac2
lunch V2 service
for Windows 2012 or earlier run this
command to restart the wcc2 config
service now you can run the previous
route print command again to verify the
correct
settings if you still experience
activation issues then add an exception
to allow Microsoft KMS traffic on any
firewor or security software that
controls outbound connection from your
instance Microsoft KMS run on Port TCP
1688 also set your windows KMS setup key
to do this identify the correct
Microsoft KMS client setup key for your
OS version then run this command as an
administrator for more information see K
Management Service KMS client activation
and product key Microsoft documentation
that's Linked In the description of this
video if your instance is originated
from an imported instance or from an
earlier Amazon ec2 classic instance then
it might not have the correct IP address
for the Microsoft KMS server to
configure and activate Windows run these
commands if it's still failing then
check the connectivity to the KMS server
with the following Powershell commands
and confirm that the connection status
output is TCP test succeed equal true
for Windows 2012 or earlier version
check the following register
key in Windows activation May Fail in
case of time sync issues for more
information see set the time for a
Windows instance AWS documentation that
is linked in the description of this
video you can also use AWS system
manager or SSM automation runbook to
troubleshoot activation issues first
confirm that you are in the corrent AWS
region and then open the system manager
console in the navigation pane choose
documents search for AWS support-
activate Windows with Amazon license and
then choose the automation document
choose execute
automation then choose simple execution
if you're already use System Manager to
manage your instances then select your
instance if you don't use System Manager
to manage your instances then turn off
show interactive instance speaker and
enter the ID of the instance this
creates a temporary rescue instance for
the automation for instances that system
manager doesn't manage set allow offline
to true and select the subnet ID that
you want the rescue instance to run or
choose select instance subnet to use the
same subnet as your estance the subnet
must be in the same availability Zone as
estance ID and must allow access to
System Manager X and
points next choose
execute after the execution completed
the overall status show as
success so now you know how to resolve
Windows activation issues on an ec2
Windows
instance thanks for watching watching an
epic cloud computing from all of us here
at AWS
[Music]
